levelList.name: Электрический визг
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Получает (Рез. зависти. - 2) Радиус атаки (Макс. 1)
[BeforeAttack] Если данный союзник имеет 20+ <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Солей</link></u></color> Счётчика, тратит 20 <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Солей</link></u></color> Счётчика чтобы нанести на +30% больше урона<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: Электрический визг
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Получает (Рез. зависти. - 2) Радиус атаки (Макс. 2)

levelList.name: Воющая-Миркалла
levelList.desc:
ХП этого союзника не падает ниже 1 во время данного скилла.
Сила клеша +1 за каждые 100 <sprite name="BloodDinner_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Accumulation">Испитое пиршество</link></u></color> у этого союзника (Макс. 2)
[BeforeAttack] При менее, чем 50 <sprite name="BloodDinner"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner">Кровавое пиршество</link></u></color>, Наносит 1 <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Кровотечение</link></u></color> каждым ударом
[EndSkill] Следующие 3 хода, теряет 10 рассудка в конце хода.<style="highlight"></style>

coindescs.desc: Наносит +0.1% больше урона за каждый <sprite name="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation">Общеиспитое пиршество</link></u></color> (Макс. 10%)<style="highlight"></style>

При 100+ <sprite name="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation">Общеиспитое пиршество</link></u></color>: Наносит +0.1% больше урона за каждый счётчик пиршества (Макс. 10%)<style="highlight"></style>

При 200+ <sprite name="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation">Общеиспитое пиршество</link></u></color>: Наносит +0.1% больше урона за каждый счётчик пиршества (Макс. 20%)<style="highlight"></style>

При 300+ <sprite name="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation">Общеиспитое пиршество</link></u></color>: Наносит +0.1% больше урона за каждый счётчик пиршества (Макс. 30%)<style="highlight"></style>

[WinDuelAttack] Наносит <sprite name="ThirstyRose"><color=#e30000><u><link="ThirstyRose">Алчущие розы</link></u></color> равное числу абсолютного резонанса похоти. (Макс. 3)<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - Major Arcana Slave!!!
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies (max 3 allies)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge] - 1) Atk Weight (max 3)

[EndSkill] Consume all [Charge] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([Charge] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max 5%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]<style="highlight"></style>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - Major Arcana Slave!!!
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies (max 3 allies)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], apply 2 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / 3)) random other allies instead (max 3 allies)</style>

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge] - 1) Atk Weight (max <style="highlight">5</style>)
[EndSkill] Consume all [Charge] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([Charge] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max <style="highlight">8</style>%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackHead] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: In the Name of Love and Hate - Major Arcana Slave!!!
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Apply 1 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / <style="highlight">2</style>)) random other allies (max <style="highlight">4</style> allies)
- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], apply 2 [MagicalGirlResponse] to (1 + (Envy Reson. / <style="highlight">2</style>)) random other allies instead (max <style="highlight">4</style> allies)

[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge] - 1) Atk Weight (max 5)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], gain +([Charge]) Atk Weight instead (max 5)</style>

[EndSkill] Consume all [Charge] Count on self to heal (2 + (Envy Reson. / 2)) allies with the least HP percentages by ([Charge] Count consumed)% HP (max 5 allies, max <style="highlight">10</style>%)

[EndSkill] If this unit is Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [ArcanaQueenOfHate]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn<style="highlight"></style>
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [MagicalGirlAppear], inflict +1 [Burst] Count</style>

levelList.name: Maximized Reversed Arcana Slave - Erasure of Hatred
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge]) Atk Weight (max 5)

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [Charge] Count and deal +1% more damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max 20%)

[BeforeAttack] If the main target has [VillainMark], deal +3% damage for every [Charge] (max 15%)

[BeforeAttack] Deal +5% damage for every 3 Envy Reson. (max 10%, rounded down)

[BeforeAttack] Base Power -12 for every Cracked Coin (max -24)

[EndSkill] If this unit is a Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [HystericGauge]<style="highlight"></style>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: Maximized Reversed Arcana Slave - Erasure of Hatred
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge]) Atk Weight (max 5)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [NoVillain], gain +([Charge] + 1) Atk Weight instead (max 5)</style>

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [Charge] Count and deal +<style="highlight">2</style>% more damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">40</style>%)

[BeforeAttack] If the main target has [VillainMark], deal +<style="highlight">5</style>% damage for every [Charge] (max <style="highlight">25</style>%)
<style="highlight">- If this unit has [HystericGauge], deal +7% damage for every [Charge] instead (max 35%)</style>

[BeforeAttack] Deal +<style="highlight">7</style>% damage for every 2 Envy Reson. (max <style="highlight">21</style>%, rounded down)

[BeforeAttack] Base Power -12 for every Cracked Coin (max -24)

[EndSkill] If this unit is a Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [HystericGauge]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Inflict [VillainMark] against the main target next turn<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: Maximized Reversed Arcana Slave - Erasure of Hatred
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain +([Charge]) Atk Weight (max 5)
- If this unit has [NoVillain], gain +([Charge] + 1) Atk Weight instead (max 5)

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [Charge] Count and deal <style="highlight">+2.5%</style> more damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max <style="highlight">50</style>%)

[BeforeAttack] If the main target has [VillainMark], deal +5% damage for every [Charge] (max 25%)
- If this unit has [HystericGauge], deal +<style="highlight">10</style>% damage for every [Charge] instead (max <style="highlight">50</style>%)

[BeforeAttack] Deal+<style="highlight">10</style>% damage for every 2 Envy Reson. (max <style="highlight">30</style>%, rounded down)

[BeforeAttack] Base Power -12 for every Cracked Coin (max -24)

[EndSkill] If this unit is a Lobotomy E.G.O::In the Name of Love and Hate Don Quixote, gain 1 [HystericGauge]

<style="highlight">- If this unit has [NoVillain], inflict +1 [Sinking] Count</style>
